alert.note: Alert for Marion; Morrow (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 6:09AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Richland, Marion, southeastern Wyandot, Morrow and southern Crawford Counties through 700 AM EDT... At 609 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Upper Sandusky to near Richwood to near Bellefontaine. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Marion, Bucyrus, Upper Sandusky, Mount Gilead, Galion, Ontario, Lexington, Crestline, Cardington, Ashley, Prospect, La Rue, Morral, Waldo, Chesterville, Sparta, Nevada, Caledonia and New Bloomington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
